overview: An evocative and imaginative exploration of a nonbinary person in a contemporary setting that reflects the issues of immigration and gender equality in today's world. This film addresses symbolic gender equality and black oppression in the Middle East and its infamous perspective. Violence and disrespect towards trans people in the world has generally been caused by lack of education. Broken people have saved broken people.  Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
title: The Minute I Was Born
